Title: Samna
Writer: Jagdish Khebudkar (lyrics), Jabbar Patel (lyrics), Aarti Prabhu (lyrics), Vijay Tendulkar (story,  screenplay,  dialogue)
Actors: Mohan Agashe, Anant Audkar, Shivaji Bhosle, Sanjivani Bidkar
Plot: Wealthy and influential Hindurao Dhonde Patil finds a homeless drunk, brings him home, looks after him, feeds him, finds a room for him, gets him employed, calls him Master, and even finds a woman to look after him. In return, this male steals from Hindurao, is apprehended by the local police, but Hindurao pays for his bail. Hindurao is forced to make a final decision about him after he finds out that Master has been inquiring about a missing army officer named Maruti Kamble.
